parsing_result:
## Network/USB Setting Menus

- Select **GATEWAY ADDRESS** and enter a gateway address.

  !Gateway Address Menu

- Select **DNS SERVER ADDRESS** and enter a DNS server address.

  !DNS Server Address Menu

### Connection Status

The status of the connection to Frame.io is shown by an icon in the electronic viewfinder or LCD monitor.

| Icon | Connection Status |
|------|-------------------|
| !White Icon | Connected to Frame.io. |
| !Amber Icon | Camera has temporarily suspended upload to Frame.io. To resume, select **Frame.io Camera to Cloud > UPLOAD SETTING > TRANSFER/SUSPEND > TRANSFER**. |
| !Gray Icon | Not connected to Frame.io. |
| !Red Icon | Frame.io server has set camera status to "paused". To restore connection, clear "paused" status using computer or other device. |
